config.general.do-auto-cast.name: Automatically Cast
config.general.do-auto-cast.tooltip: Keybind to toggle automatically casting your fishing rod. Will try casting every second if enabled.
config.general.skip-fishing-minigame.too: Skips the fishing minigame. Amount of catches required before skip can be changed below.
config.general.skip-minigame-popup.name: Skip Pop-up
config.general.skip-minigame-popup.toolt: Stops the minigame from popping up before automatically catching the fish.
config.general.skip-fishing-minigame-cat: Amount of catches required before it skips the minigame. The "Skip Minigame" option must be enabled.
config.general.skip-fishing-minigame-per: The chance that the minigame skip causes a perfect catch. "Always Perfect" trumps this option. The "Skip Minigame" option must be enabled.
config.general.skip-fishing-minigame-tre: The chance that the skip minigame catches treasure, if there was one. "Instant Catch Treasure" trumps this option. The "Skip Minigame" option must be enabled.
config.general.difficulty-multiplier.too: Value with which the standard fishing difficulty is multiplied.
config.general.adjust-xp-gain-difficulty: Adjust the XP gained based on the fish difficulty set above.
config.general.fish-in-bar-multiplier.to: A multiplier for the increase given when the fish is inside the green bar. The higher the value, the quicker the fish is caught.
config.general.fish-not-in-bar-penalty-m: A multiplier for the penalty given when the fish is outside of the green bar. The higher the value, the quicker the fish escapes.
config.general.bar-size-multiplier.name: Bar Size Multiplier
config.general.bar-size-multiplier.toolt: A multiplier for the size of the bar in the fishing minigame. The higher the value, the larger the bar.
Always casts the fishing rod with maximum power, no matter how long you held the button.
config.general.auto-hook.name: Automatically Hook
config.general.auto-hook.tooltip: Automatically starts reeling in your fish after one bites.
config.general.always-perfect.name: Always Perfect
config.general.always-perfect.tooltip: Always get a perfect after catching a fish, even if you did not.
config.general.instant-catch-treasure.to: If there are any treasures in the fishing minigame, instantly catch them even if you missed them.
config.general.treasure-in-bar-multiplie: A multiplier for the increase given when a treasure is inside the green bar. The higher the value, the quicker the treasure is caught.
config.general.allow-catching-fish.name: Fish
config.general.allow-catching-fish.toolt: Increases the chance of catching fish when enabled.
config.general.allow-catching-rubbish.to: Increases the chance of catching rubbish when enabled.
config.general.allow-catching-other.name: Other
config.general.allow-catching-other.tool: Increases the chance of catching other items when enabled. This includes items such as seaweed and algae.
config.general.number-of-fish-caught.too: Catch the set amount of fish. Using bait may override this amount. Whichever is highest.
config.general.minimum-fish-quality.name: Minimum Fish Quality
config.general.minimum-fish-quality.tool: Always gets fish of the set quality or better. Trumps the "Fish Quality" option.
config.general.fish-quality.name: Set Fish Quality
config.general.fish-quality.tooltip: Always catch fish with the set quality. Trumped by the "Minimum Fish Quality" option.
config.general.treasure-appearance.name: Treasure Probability
config.general.treasure-appearance.toolt: Adjust how often treasure chests appear.
config.general.golden-treasure-appearanc: Adjust how often a treasure chest is a golden treasure chest.
config.general.instant-bite.name: Instant Bite
config.general.instant-bite.tooltip: Fish instantly bite after casting your fishing rod.
config.general.auto-loot-fish.name: Automatically Loot Fish
config.general.auto-loot-fish.tooltip: Automatically loot and close the fish popup after catching a fish.
config.general.auto-loot-treasure.name: Automatically Loot Treasure
config.general.auto-loot-treasure.toolti: Automatically loot and close the treasure menu popup after catching treasure.
config.general.do-speed-up-animations.to: Various animations are quicker. These include the casting, reeling and treasure opening animations.
config.general.disable-vibrations.name: Disable Vibrations
config.general.disable-vibrations.toolti: Disables various controller vibrations while fishing.
config.attachments.override-attachment-l: Overrides the fishing rod's attachment limit when spawning bait and tackle. WARNING: does not work in multiplayer.
config.attachments.reset-attachments-lim: Resets attachment limit back to the default when unequipping the fishing rod. WARNING: If you have any attachments in an overriden slot, they will be deleted.
config.attachments.infinite-bait.name: Infinite Bait
config.attachments.spawn-bait-when-equip: Spawns the below selected bait item whenever you equip your fishing rod.
config.attachments.amount-of-bait.name: Amount of Bait
config.attachments.spawn-which-bait.name: Bait to Spawn
config.attachments.spawn-which-bait.tool: Which bait to automatically spawn when fishing rod is equipped.
config.attachments.infinite-tackle.name: Infinite Tackles
config.attachments.spawn-tackle-when-equ: Spawns the below selected tackle item whenever you equip your fishing rod.
config.attachments.spawn-which-tackle.to: Which tackle to automatically spawn when fishing rod is equipped.
Adds enchantments as set below when checked.
config.enchantments.reset-enchantments.t: Resets enchantments to what they were before after unequipping the fishing rod.
config.enchantments.add-all-enchantments: Adds all available enchantments when you equip a fishing rod.
config.enchantments.add-auto-hook-enchan: Adds the auto-hook enchantment when equipping a fishing rod.
config.enchantments.add-efficient-tool-e: Adds the efficient tool enchantment when equipping a fishing rod.
config.enchantments.add-master-enchantme: Adds the master enchantment when equipping a fishing rod.
config.enchantments.add-preserving-encha: Adds the preserving enchantment when equipping a fishing rod.
